# Wolf Chat Requirements
# Generated by analyzing all Python imports in the project

# ============================================================
# Core API and Framework Dependencies
# ============================================================
# OpenAI API client for LLM interaction
openai

# MCP (Modular Capability Provider) framework
mcp

# Python environment configuration
python-dotenv

# ============================================================
# Computer Vision and UI Automation
# ============================================================
# OpenCV for image processing and template matching
opencv-python

# NumPy for numerical operations (used with OpenCV)
numpy

# PyAutoGUI for GUI automation (screenshot, keyboard, mouse)
pyautogui

# Pillow (PIL) for image manipulation
Pillow

# ImageHash for perceptual image hashing
imagehash

# ============================================================
# Windows-Specific Dependencies
# ============================================================
# PyWin32 for Windows API access
pywin32

# PyGetWindow for window management
pygetwindow

# Clipboard operations
pyperclip

# Keyboard event handling
keyboard

# ============================================================
# Database and Storage
# ============================================================
# ChromaDB for vector database and semantic search
chromadb

# ============================================================
# System Monitoring and Process Management
# ============================================================
# Process and system utilities
psutil

# ============================================================
# GUI and Interface Libraries
# ============================================================
# TTKBootstrap for modern tkinter themes
ttkbootstrap

# Matplotlib for data visualization
matplotlib

# Pandas for data manipulation and analysis
pandas

# ============================================================
# Scheduling and Task Management
# ============================================================
# Schedule for task scheduling
schedule

# ============================================================
# HTTP and Web
# ============================================================
# urllib3 for HTTP client (SSL warning suppression)
urllib3

# ============================================================
# Additional Utilities
# ============================================================
# Progress bar for CLI
tqdm

# ============================================================
# Notes:
# ============================================================
# - asyncio, json, os, sys, time, threading, subprocess, signal,
#   platform, collections, datetime, pathlib, typing, functools,
#   logging, argparse, re, io, math, hashlib, difflib, ctypes,
#   sqlite3, zipfile, shutil, configparser, dataclasses, inspect
#   are all standard library modules and do not need to be installed
#
# - Some imports are from local modules (config, ui_interaction,
#   llm_interaction, mcp_client, chroma_client, game_manager,
#   memory_manager, position_tool_server, etc.) and are not listed here
#
# - Pydantic and pydantic_core are dependencies of mcp package
#   and should be installed automatically
